title: "Bernstein Says IBM is Best-Positioned to Take Advantage of AI"
excerpt: "According to Bernstein analysts, IBM (NYSE:IBM) is the leading US IT hardware company in terms of leveraging AI technology. They believe that generative AI has a “neutral to potentially positive” impact on IT hardware companies."
